org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.qjournal.client

Class AsyncLoggerSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.qjournal.client.AsyncLoggerSet

  •  class AsyncLoggerSet
extends Object
    Wrapper around a set of Loggers, taking care of fanning out calls to the underlying loggers and constructing corresponding QuorumCall instances.

    • Method Detail

      • setEpoch

        void setEpoch(long e)

      • setCommittedTxId

        public void setCommittedTxId(long txid)
        Set the highest successfully committed txid seen by the writer. This should be called after a successful write to a quorum, and is used for extra sanity checks against the protocol. See HDFS-3863.

      • isEpochEstablished

        boolean isEpochEstablished()
        Returns:
        true if an epoch has been established.

      • getEpoch

        long getEpoch()
        Returns:
        the epoch number for this writer. This may only be called after a successful call to #createNewUniqueEpoch(NamespaceInfo).

      • close

        void close()
        Close all of the underlying loggers.

      • purgeLogsOlderThan

        void purgeLogsOlderThan(long minTxIdToKeep)

      • waitForWriteQuorum

        <V> Map<AsyncLogger,V> waitForWriteQuorum(QuorumCall<AsyncLogger,V> q,
                                        int timeoutMs,
                                        String operationName)
                                throws IOException
        Wait for a quorum of loggers to respond to the given call. If a quorum can't be achieved, throws a QuorumException.
        Parameters:
        q - the quorum call
        timeoutMs - the number of millis to wait
        operationName - textual description of the operation, for logging
        Returns:
        a map of successful results
        Throws:
        QuorumException - if a quorum doesn't respond with success
        IOException - if the thread is interrupted or times out

      • getMajoritySize

        int getMajoritySize()
        Returns:
        the number of nodes which are required to obtain a quorum.

      • getMajorityString

        String getMajorityString()
        Returns:
        a textual description of the majority size (eg "2/3" or "3/5")

      • size

        int size()
        Returns:
        the number of loggers behind this set

      • toString

        public String toString()

      • getLoggersForTests

        List<AsyncLogger> getLoggersForTests()
        Returns:
        the (mutable) list of loggers, for use in tests to set up spies
